itunes:title: It's Aloha Friday (with Kimo Kahoano)
title: It's Aloha Friday (with Kimo Kahoano)
description:
Kimo Kahoano tells the story behind Hawaiʻi’s pau hana anthem, “It’s Aloha Friday”.
